Articles.Content:
Just another guy making stuff explod on Kerbin!

(Yes, you heard me right, explod!)

I recently got back into this game after the 0.25 update, plus I'm playing career mode for once!

I have to say, thanks for contracts, Squad. Before you implemented them, I was really confused on where to start in career mode.

Anyhow, hope to see you all around the forums!
Hello wtg62. Nice to see another lurker coming in from the cold.
Hello, and welcome to KSP Forum, wtg62!
Hi there, Welcome back! So how can I make things explod? I'm assuming it's like exploding, unless your one of those clever people and it's really your term for getting a perfect orbit?

Thanks for the welcome! I had thought I wasn't registered here... bleh, apparently I was!

To make things explod, simply hold shift and press space.

Warning: May or may not work depending on where the craft is pointing.
